DOC.brief_title: Tamoxifen Clomiphene Citrate Mild Stimulation IVF
DOC.detailed_description: The report prevalence poor ovarian responder amongst patient undergo IVF-ET 9 % -24 % , morbidity must high nowadays . For woman , Mild stimulation important ovulation induction protocol . Clomiphene citrate ( CC ) tamoxifen ( TMX ) commonly use mild stimulation protocol . It 's report CC adverse effect growth endrometrium result thin endrometrium ( ≤7mm ) maybe affect pregnancy rate . However , TMX estrogen-like effect endrometrium may helpful increase endormetrial thickness . The reported result compare CC TMX show similar ovulation rate . Prospective study necessary confirm whether TMX superior CC IVF outcome .
DOC.criteria: 1. age 37 42 ; 2 . BMI≤23kg/m2 ; 3 . ≤3 oocytes conventional stimulation protocol ; 4 . AFC＜5 follicles AMH＜1.1 ng/ml day 1 5 menses ; 5 . Cause Infertiity : tubal factor , male factor , diminish ovarian reserve . 1. endormetrial polyp , endormetrial cancer , intrauterine adhesion , uterine fibroid affect uterine cavity 2 . Endometriosis , adenomyosis 3 . The diameter Hydrosalpinx ＞2cm
